title: Rocket salad with fried goat cheese
ingredients: ['1 (125g) log goat cheese', '60g panko breadcrumbs, or as needed', '6 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or to taste', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '120g rocket', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
